snippet: Every four years, when a likely party nominee emerges, so do the informal advisers, and right now, Charlie Black is just one of many who are counseling Mitt Romney.
abstract: Campaign Memo profiles Charlie Black, a prototypical informal adviser and familiar Washington campaign lifer who is among those counseling Mitt Romney.; Black is available for old-pro advice, back-channel information and whatever else the campaign happens to need.
lead_paragraph: Every four years, when a likely party nominee emerges, so do the informal advisers, and right now, Charlie Black is just one of many who are counseling Mitt Romney.

headline.main: Aides With Candidate’s Ear, if Not Title or Paycheck
headline.print_headline: Aides With a Candidate’s Ear, If Not Any Titles or Paychecks
